abstract.p: Red Sky in San Francisco, specialist in interactive communications, acquires Olive Jar Studios, an animation and film production company based in Boston and Los Angeles, and White Noise Productions, a multimedia agency in Los Angeles; Fred Macdonald, chief executive and executive creative director at Olive Jar, will become senior vice president and executive creative director at Red Sky; Matthew Charde, chief operating officer an executive producer at Olive Jar, and Peter Lehner, chairman at White Noise, will become vice presidents and general managers at Red Sky (S)

block.p: Red Sky in San Francisco, a specialist in interactive communications, has acquired Olive Jar Studios, an animation and film production company based in Boston and Los Angeles, and White Noise Productions, a multimedia agency in Los Angeles. Terms were not disclosed.

Red Sky in San Francisco, a specialist in interactive communications, has acquired Olive Jar Studios, an animation and film production company based in Boston and Los Angeles, and White Noise Productions, a multimedia agency in Los Angeles. Terms were not disclosed.

After Red Sky absorbs the two companies, it will have more than 500 employees in offices in eight cities. Fred Macdonald, 35, chief executive and executive creative director at Olive Jar, will become senior vice president and executive creative director at Red Sky. Matthew Charde, 35, chief operating officer and executive producer at Olive Jar, and Peter Lehner, 44, chairman at White Noise, will become vice presidents and general managers at Red Sky.
